Episodes.Title: My Bad
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Chip Johannessen
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Jennifer Carpenter, Desmond Harrington
Episodes.Plot: In the Season 5 premiere, Dexter reels from Rita's murder while Quinn stirs up trouble by suggesting that Rita's death doesn't fit Trinity's profile.

Episodes.Title: Hello Bandit
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Scott Buck
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Jennifer Carpenter, Desmond Harrington
Episodes.Plot: Dexter fights his dark urges, but a shocking discovery puts him on the trail of a new victim; Debra hosts her brother and his children but finds herself squeezed out of her own place.

Episodes.Title: Practically Perfect
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Manny Coto
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Jennifer Carpenter, Desmond Harrington
Episodes.Plot: In an effort to create more free time to stalk and kill victims, Dexter hires a nanny; Debra is annoyed by her new rookie partner; Quinn pursues the theory that Trinity did not kill Rita.

Episodes.Title: Beauty And The Beast
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Jim Leonard
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Jennifer Carpenter, Desmond Harrington
Episodes.Plot: Dexter has to save a life instead of taking one; Deb has a scary confrontation with a key suspect in the Santa Muerte murder cases; Quinn continues following up on the strange similarities between 'Kyle Butler' and Dexter Morgan.

Episodes.Title: First Blood
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Tim Schlattmann
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Jennifer Carpenter, Desmond Harrington
Episodes.Plot: When Dexter is saddled with an unwanted conspirator, he is forced to make some hard decisions about her fate; Dexter wonders if Rita's death has awakened a darkness inside Harrison; Quinn enlists an old friend to look into Dexter.

Episodes.Title: Everything Is Illumenated
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Wendy West
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Jennifer Carpenter, Desmond Harrington
Episodes.Plot: Trying to get his life back on track, Dexter hunts a new target, but is distracted and drawn into a precarious situation while helping his troubled acquaintance; Batista discovers an interesting lead in the Santa Muerte murder cases.

Episodes.Title: Circle Us
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Scott Buck
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Jennifer Carpenter, Desmond Harrington
Episodes.Plot: While helping Lumen, Dexter finds himself on a collision course with Homicide when he is called to investigate a horrifying crime scene; the Santa Muerte case leads to a violent standoff between Debra and the killers.

Episodes.Title: Take It!
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Manny Coto
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Jennifer Carpenter, Desmond Harrington
Episodes.Plot: While attending a self-help seminar, Dexter and Lumen stalk a violent killer; Debra gets into unexpected trouble from the fallout of the Santa Muerte case, forcing Batista to make a difficult decision.

Episodes.Title: Teenage Wasteland
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Lauren Gussis
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Jennifer Carpenter, Desmond Harrington
Episodes.Plot: In the midst of hunting their next victim, Dexter and Lumen are surprised by the return of an unannounced guest; Debra is assigned to the file room, but manages to uncover new evidence in the Barrel Girl case.

Episodes.Title: In The Beginning
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Scott Reynolds
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Jennifer Carpenter, Desmond Harrington
Episodes.Plot: Dexter discovers a possible ally in the pursuit of Lumen's former captors, but he and Lumen are forced to step down when homicide uncovers evidence linked to one of their prior victims.

Episodes.Title: Hop A Freighter
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Karen Campbell
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Jennifer Carpenter, Desmond Harrington
Episodes.Plot: Dexter is forced to do damage control after he concedes that someone outside of Miami Metro has taken an interest in him and Lumen.

Episodes.Title: The Big One
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Chip Johannessen
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Jennifer Carpenter, Desmond Harrington
Episodes.Plot: In the Season 5 finale, Dexter realizes that he and Lumen are being lured into a trap and risks everything to escape; Quinn needs help that only Dexter can provide.
